subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Michael Van Schaick scored 23 points to lead host Fairfield past Iona, 70-67, in overtime Tuesday night, extending Iona’s school-record losing streak to 20.
snippet: Michael Van Schaick scored 23 points to lead host Fairfield past Iona, 70-67, in overtime Tuesday night, extending Iona’s school-record losing streak to 20.
